title: RUN! SCP-008 Fanart
content:
[[>]]
[[module rate]]
[[/>]]

[[=]]

++ RUN! SCP-008 Fanart

[[/=]]

------

honestly, any excuse to draw [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-008 zombies] badly is my jam

up to your own headcanon if the human is part of an MTF or an unfortunate civilian 

[[=image https://imgur.com/UwN2bd2.jpg]]

[[=]]

++++++ //"RUN! SCP-008 Fanart", marker and ink, May 2023//

[[/=]]

please consider [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/reform-the-universe reforming the universe] with me, where you can find [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/kit-s-home-hub-of-happening kit] and a mishmash of other horrors, comforts and devastations.

------

[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/art:gerbilgoddess gerbil goddess]

[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/art:kitsuckingtoohardonthatlollipop kit]

[[/=]]
author: Zara Calico
